nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.linear

Class HalfLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<HalfLine>
      • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.linear.HalfLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<HalfLine>, InfiniteGeometry<LineSegment>

    public class HalfLine
extends BaseGeometry<HalfLine>
implements InfiniteGeometry<LineSegment>
    A halfline or ray, starting at a certain point, its origin, shooting into a given direction to infinity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HalfLine(Vector origin, Vector unnormalizedDirection)
      Constructs a halfline starting at a point, in a certain direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HalfLine

        public HalfLine(Vector origin,
                Vector unnormalizedDirection)
        Constructs a halfline starting at a point, in a certain direction. Note that the direction need not be normalized.
        Parameters:
        origin - the halfline starts at this point
        unnormalizedDirection - the direction of the halfline

    • Method Detail

      • byThroughpoint

        public static HalfLine byThroughpoint(Vector origin,
                                      Vector through)
        Computes a line, by providing two points through which it passes. Note that the first provided point (origin) is used to define the line.
        Parameters:
        origin - startpoint of the halfline
        through - the halfline must pass through this point
        Returns:
        constructed halfline

      • clip

        public LineSegment clip(Rectangle rect)
        Description copied from interface: InfiniteGeometry
        Clips the infinite geometry to the part that lies strictly within the clipbox. Degeneracies (e.g. the parts coinciding with or touching the boundary), need not be returned. A null result indicates that the geometry has no part strictly within the clipbox.
        Specified by:
        clip in interface InfiniteGeometry<LineSegment>
        Returns:

      • perpendicular

        public Vector perpendicular()
        Returns the vector that is 90 degrees rotated (in counterclockwise direction) from the direction of this halfline. This perpendicular points towards the left side of the halfline.
        Returns:
        the perpendicular

      • inHalfSpace

        public boolean inHalfSpace(Vector point)
        Determines whether the provided point lies inside the halfspace indicated by this halfline, at precision DoubleUtil.EPS.
        Parameters:
        point - test point
        Returns:
        whether point is in halfspace

      • inHalfSpace

        public boolean inHalfSpace(Vector point,
                           double prec)
        Determines whether the provided point lies inside the halfspace indicated by this halfline, at a given precision. Note that a negative value of precision allows for testing an open halfspace (excluding the boundary).
        Parameters:
        point - test point
        prec - precision
        Returns:
        whether point is in halfspace

      • onBoundary

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        point - test point
        prec - desired precision
        Returns:
        whether point touches the boundary

      • closestPoint

        public Vector closestPoint(Vector point)
        Description copied from class: BaseGeometry
        Computes the point on this geometry that is closest to the provided point. Note that this need not be a new vector.
        Specified by:
        closestPoint in class BaseGeometry<HalfLine>
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Description copied from class: BaseGeometry

        Parameters:

        prec - precision of the computation
        intersections - list in which to store the intersection
